description.narrative: This activity (Market Development - Phase 2 (2018 - 2020)) is a component of Zimbabwe Livelihoods and Food Security Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £3,232,347. This component benefits Zimbabwe, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Agricultural services, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 09-05-2018 and the end date is 31-03-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
